UX/ UI DESIGNER (COPENHAGEN, DENMARK), ONSITE, NO VISA SPONSORSHIP PROVIDED.

Game Analytics is the #1 free analytics tool designed to help game developers and publishers drive conversions, refine critical flows, and boost retention for their titles by making the right decisions based on data. Currently, 16,000+ game developers use Game Analytics to track performance in 38,000+ titles around the globe.

The product team consist currently of 2 people; a project manager in London and our Head of Product in Denmark (Copenhagen). This position will be to join the team in Copenhagen to work closely with our Head of Product. One of our larger projects for the coming year is rebuilding our entire interface and user experience, you will help an instrumental part in this transformation!

Interested? Then apply on: https://gameanalytics-jobs.workable.com/jobs/835672.
